tool.name: Step 1: Split scaffolds
tool.description: Step 1 of 4 in MGEScan-LTR: Split into separate sets of scaffolds of input genome sequences, if it is necessary.
tool.help:
Running the program ===================
Scaffold input genome sequences will be divided into several files for each genome sequence as a pre-processing of MGEScan-LTR.
No: The input won't be separated. Yes: The input will be divided for each genome sequence.
